Frivolous Lola

Ano: 1998

IMDb ID: tt0174931

Classificação: 5.1

Sinopse: In verdant 1950s rural Italy, charming bride-to-be Lola has no intention of walking down the aisle as a spotless virgin. At the same time, Masetto, her old-school bread-baker fiancé, has other plans, insisting on deflowering his beloved sweetheart not earlier than the night of their wedding. Lola, however, is impatient and, above all, dissatisfied. As a result, Lola never misses an opportunity to flaunt her smooth, well-rounded derrière while riding her bicycle. And before long, wild curiosity turns into bottled-up sexuality, inflaming Lola's unspoken fervent desires. Undoubtedly, frivolous Lola knows what she wants, and she wants it now. But the question remains. Will Masetto keep her waiting?—Nick Riganas
